resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104229</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104229</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202520</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Translations, Reflections, Rotations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersetzungen, Reflexionen, Umdrehungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traductions, Réflexions, Rotations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Traduções, Reflexões, Rotações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Traduzioni, Riflessioni, Rotazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφράσεις, αντανακλάσεις, περιστροφές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Traducciones, Reflexiones, Rotaciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will allow students to explore translations, reflections, and rotations using a resource of Shodor Education Foundation, Inc. Permission has been granted for the use of the materials as part of the workshop Interactivate Your Math Students.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion erlaubt Kursteilnehmern, 
Übersetzungen, Reflexionen zu erforschen, und Umdrehungen mit einem 
Hilfsmittel von Shodor Education Foundation, Inc. Erlaubnis ist für 
den Gebrauch von den Materialien als Teil der Werkstatt Interactivate 
Ihre Mathe-Kursteilnehmer bewilligt worden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon permettra à des étudiants 
d'explorer des traductions, réflexions, et des rotations en utilisant
une ressource de permission de Shodor Education Foundation, Inc. a 
été accordées pour l'usage des matériaux en tant qu'élément de 
l'atelier Interactivate vos étudiants de maths.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição permitirá que os estudantes explorem
traduções, reflexões, e as rotações usando um recurso de 
permissão de Shodor Instrução Fundação, Inc. foram concedidas 
para o uso dos materiais como a parte da oficina Interactivate seus 
estudantes do math.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione permetterà che gli allievi 
esplorino le traduzioni, riflessioni e le rotazioni usando una risorsa
di permesso di Shodor Education Foundation, Inc. è stata assegnata 
per l'uso dei materiali come componente del workshop Interactivate i 
vostri allievi di per la matematica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα επιτρέψει στους σπουδαστές για να 
ερευνήσει τις μεταφράσεις, αντανακλάσεις, και στις περιστροφές που
χρησιμοποιούν ένα στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς του ιδρύματος 
εκπαίδευσης Shodor, δικαιοδοσία Α.Ε. έχουν χορηγηθεί για τη 
χρήση των υλικών ως τμήμα του εργαστηρίου Interactivate οι 
σπουδαστές Math σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección permitirá que los estudiantes 
exploren las traducciones, reflexiones, y las rotaciones usando un 
recurso de permiso de Shodor Education Foundation, Inc. se han 
concedido para el uso de los materiales como parte del taller 
Interactivate sus estudiantes de la matemáticas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DEBORAH BOURNE
FN:DEBORAH BOURNE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202520</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104229</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/translations-reflections-rotations</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
